thread.title: Eagles rally falls short to Oglethorpe County
thread.title_full: Eagles rally falls short to Oglethorpe County

author: AccessWDUN Staff
title: Eagles rally falls short to Oglethorpe County
text:
Saturday October 17th, 2015 3:27AM Posted 7:16AM on Saturday 17th October 2015 ( 3 hours from now ) Eagles rally falls short to Oglethorpe County By AccessWDUN Staff Related Articles 2015 High school football rankings 2015 High School Football region standings WEEK 8: Surprises abound in wild night of prep football VIDEO: Rabun County routs Union County in top 10 showdown, 49-3 
GAINESVILLE — Oglethorpe County snapped an eight-game losing streak with a 21-16 win over Riverside Military at Maginnis Field Friday night in Region 8-AA action. 
The Patriots (1-7, 1-3 Region 8-AA) ran out to a 21-3 halftime lead before the Eagles (1-6, 0-3) mounted a furious second half comeback. 
Kaseem Duke scored a third quarter touchdown to cut the lead to 21-10. Riverside then intercepted an Oglethorpe County pass in the end zone to stay within striking distance. 
Chandler Jones converted a 4th-and-6 and moments later connected on a 35-yard pass to Javon Thompson to trim the lead to 21-16 with just over four minutes left. 
But the Patriots converted a 4th-and-1 with just over a minute left and ran out the clock to preserve the win. 
The Eagles will travel to Greene County next week. Associated Categories : Sports , High School Sports , Friday Game Night Associated Tags : High school football, Riverside Military Academy football © Copyright 2015 AccessWDUN.com
